tha-ap178:0.3_0: He is praised by the senior monks, the junior monks with good qualities,
tha-ap178:1.3_0: For the benefit of welfare and happiness in this life,
tha-ap178:1.4_0: walking mindfully in the open air.
tha-ap178:2.4_0: I paid homage at her and bowed,
tha-ap178:3.1_0: I’ve stayed in the twenty-five years of age,
tha-ap178:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap178:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhī.
